message: Can anyone recommend code generator that also creates procedures with paging, i need a very good one that i can use with multiple databases oracle and SQL ?

data.message:
Code generators are so old school. Of day use something like NHibernate ORM or so.

But to answer your question, the tools in LLBLGen ORM have very good generators. A great commercial tool.

I agree with Meligy as the most mature ORM I've ever used in the .NET world was LLBLGen.
it supports number of the most popular DBs (sql,mysql,oracle, and more).
Give it a try and see if it can fit your specific needs, and if not, I guess building one with your custom requirements will not be a mysterious task anymore, but i'm not with solutions which reinvents the ORM (wheel) :)
